title: The After Show Talks to Tony V About Social Media and Cigars
itunes:title: The After Show Talks to Tony V About Social Media and Cigars
description:
Are there any rules to follow when posting to cigar social media sites? Dave covers 10 rules to avoid being annoying on social media.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
